lead_paragraph: LUBOWITZ--Murray, passed away peacefully at home on May 30, 2016. Predeceased by his beloved wife Lila. Dearly loved father of Susan, Steven and Karen. Devoted grandfather, father-in-law, uncle and friend to so many. We will miss and love you forever. Services at Parkside Memorial Chapel, 98-60 Queens Boulevard, Rego Park, NY 11374 on Thursday, June 2 at noon. 1/3
